summary.span: 显示使用模板的项的数据绑定列表控件。

span.span: A data bound list control that displays items using templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [模板Templates](#templates) - [自定义 DataList 控件的外观Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control](#customizing_the_appearance_of_the_datalist_control) - [显示方向和布局Display Direction and Layout](#display_direction_and_layout) - [安全性Security](#security) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件显示模板定义的数据绑定列表。Use the control to display a template-defined data bound list. 控件支持选择和编辑。The control supports selecting and editing. ## 模板Templates 可以使用模板来操作控件的内容。The contents of the control can be manipulated by using templates. 下表列出了支持的模板。The following table lists the supported templates. |模板名称Template Name|说明Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||如果已定义, 则在中提供交替项的内容和布局。If defined, provides the content and layout for alternating items in the . 如果未定义, `ItemTemplate`则使用。If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| ||如果已定义, 则为中当前正在编辑的项提供内容和布局。If defined, provides the content and layout for the item currently being edited in the . 如果未定义, `ItemTemplate`则使用。If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| ||如果已定义, 则提供的脚注部分的内容和布局。If defined, provides the content and layout for the footer section of the . 如果未定义, 则不会显示页脚部分。If not defined, a footer section will not be displayed.| ||如果已定义, 则提供的标头部分的内容和布局。If defined, provides the content and layout for the header section of the . 如果未定义, 则不会显示页眉节。If not defined, a header section will not be displayed.| ||为中的项提供内容和布局的必需模板。Required template that provides the content and layout for items in the .| ||如果已定义, 则为中的当前选定项提供内容和布局。If defined, provides the content and layout for the currently selected item in the . 如果未定义, 则使用。If not defined, is used.| ||如果已定义, 则为中的项之间的分隔符提供内容和布局。If defined, provides the content and layout for the separator between items in the . 如果未定义, 则不会显示分隔符。If not defined, a separator will not be displayed.| 在极少数情况下, 需要定义以显示控件中的项。At the very minimum, the needs to be defined to display the items in the control. 可以使用其他模板为控件提供自定义外观。Additional templates can be used to provide a custom look to the control. ## 自定义 DataList 控件的外观Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control 可以通过设置控件的不同部分的样式属性来自定义控件的外观。The appearance of the control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |Style 属性Style Property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||指定控件中交替项的样式。Specifies the style for alternating items in the control.| ||指定要在控件中编辑的项的样式。Specifies the style for the item being edited in the control.| ||指定控件中的脚注的样式。Specifies the style for the footer in the control.| ||指定控件中标头的样式。Specifies the style for the header in the control.| ||指定控件中项的样式。Specifies the style for the items in the control.| ||指定控件中的选定项的样式。Specifies the style for the selected item in the control.| ||指定控件中的项之间的分隔符样式。Specifies the style for the separator between the items in the control.| 还可以显示或隐藏控件的不同部分。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 下表列出了属性, 这些属性控制要显示或隐藏的部分。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |PropertyProperty|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||显示或隐藏控件的页脚部分。Shows or hides the footer section of the control.| ||显示或隐藏控件的标头部分。Shows or hides the header section of the control.| ## 显示方向和布局Display Direction and Layout 控件的显示方向可以为垂直或水平。The display direction of a control can be vertical or horizontal. 设置属性以指定显示方向。Set the property to specify the display direction. 控件的布局是由属性控制的。The layout of the control is controlled with the property. 如果将此属性`RepeatLayout.Table`设置为, 则将以表格格式显示`RepeatLayout.Flow` , 而不显示表结构。Setting this property to `RepeatLayout.Table` will display the in a table format, while `RepeatLayout.Flow` displays the without a table structure. ## 安全性Security `DataList`控件可以包含允许用户输入信息的控件。The `DataList` control can contain controls that enable users to enter information. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关安全性的详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件显示数据源中的项列表。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display a list of items from a data source. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取 控件中交替项的样式属性。

span.span: Gets the style properties for alternating items in the control.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示 控件中交替项的样式属性。

span.span: A object that represents the style properties for alternating items in the control.

value.span: 默认值是一个空 对象。

span.span: The default value is an empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性为控件中的交替项提供自定义样式。 Use the property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括单元中的前景色、背景色、字体和内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强控件的外观。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 控件中的项样式属性从一个项样式属性继承到层次结构中的另一个。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在层次结构中设置较低的项样式属性将由层次结构中较高的项样式属性继承。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如, 如果为属性指定红色字体, 则控件中的所有其他项样式属性还将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置单个项样式属性来为控件提供常见的外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以通过设置层次结构中较高的项样式属性的样式属性来覆盖该属性的继承样式设置。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如, 您可以为属性指定一个蓝色字体, 并覆盖在属性中指定的红色字体。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表按从高到低的顺序列出了层次结构顺序。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |优先级Precedence|Style 属性Style property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要为交替项指定自定义样式, 请将``标记放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始``标记中列出样式属性。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为控件中的交替项指定不同的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different background color for alternating items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制控件中交替项的内容。 Use the property to control the contents of alternating items in the control. 交替项的外观由属性控制。The appearance of alternating items is controlled by the property. 若要为替换项指定模板, 请将``标记放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。To specify a template for the alternating items, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始标记和结束``标记之间列出模板的内容。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制控件中交替项的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of alternating items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 对 控件中的某项单击 按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the button is clicked for an item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击控件中`Cancel`的项的按钮时, 将引发事件。 The event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the control. 事件的典型处理程序将属性设置为`-1` (取消选择项 ), 然后将数据重新绑定到控件。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文本在控件中显示之前未经过 HTML 编码。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 这样就可以在文本的 HTML 标记中嵌入脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控件的值来自用户输入, 请务必验证这些值以减少安全漏洞。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它取消单击 `Cancel`按钮时对控件中的项所做的任何编辑。It cancels any edits made to an item in the control when the `Cancel` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击控件中`Delete`的项的按钮时, 将引发事件。 The event is raised when the `Delete` button is clicked for an item in the control. 事件的典型处理程序将从数据源中删除所选的项, 然后将数据重新绑定到控件。A typical handler for the event removes the selected item from the data source and then rebinds the data to the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 单击 按钮`Delete`时, 它将删除控件中的选定项。It deletes the selected item in the control when the `Delete` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击控件中`Edit`的项的按钮时, 将引发事件。 The event is raised when the `Edit` button is clicked for an item in the control. 事件的典型处理程序将属性设置为所选的行, 然后将数据重新绑定到控件。A typical handler for the event sets the property to the selected row and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 文本在控件中显示之前未经过 HTML 编码。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 这样就可以在文本的 HTML 标记中嵌入脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果控件的值来自用户输入, 请务必验证这些值以减少安全漏洞。If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它允许在单击 `Edit`按钮时编辑控件中的选定项。It allows you to edit the selected item in the control when the `Edit` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit/CS/datalisteditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit/VB/datalisteditvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit2/CS/datalistedit2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit2/VB/datalistedit2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式指定要编辑的项。Use the property to programmatically specify the item to edit. 你还可以使用此属性来确定为进行编辑而选定的项的索引。You can also use this property to determine the index of the item selected for editing. > [!NOTE] > 属性是从零开始的。The property is zero based. 若要取消选择某一项 , 请`-1`将属性设置为。To unselect an item, set the property to `-1`. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 属性存储在控件状态中。The property is stored in control state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定用户为进行编辑而选定的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the item selected by the user for editing. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可为在控件中选择进行编辑的项提供自定义样式。 Use the property to provide a custom style for the item selected for editing in the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括单元中的前景色、背景色、字体和内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强控件的外观。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 控件中的项样式属性从一个项样式属性继承到层次结构中的另一个。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在层次结构中设置较低的项样式属性将由层次结构中较高的项样式属性继承。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如, 如果为属性指定红色字体, 则控件中的所有其他项样式属性还将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置单个项样式属性来为控件提供常见的外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以通过设置层次结构中较高的项样式属性的样式属性来覆盖该属性的继承样式设置。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如, 您可以为属性指定一个蓝色字体, 并覆盖在属性中指定的红色字体。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表按从高到低的顺序列出了层次结构顺序。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |优先级Precedence|Style 属性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要为选择进行编辑的项指定自定义样式, 请``将标记放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。To specify a custom style for the item selected for editing, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始``标记中列出样式属性。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为用户选择的要编辑的项指定不同的外观。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different appearance for the item selected by the user for editing. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制在控件中选择进行编辑的项的内容。 Use the property to control the contents of the item selected for editing in the control. 选择进行编辑的项的外观由属性控制。The appearance of the item selected for editing is controlled by the property. 若要为选择进行编辑的项指定模板, 请将``标记放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。To specify a template for the item selected for editing, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始标记和结束``标记之间列出模板的内容。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制用户为进行编辑而选定的项的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the item selected by the user for editing. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件的行（在 控件的每一模板中定义）是否被提取和显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rows of a control, defined in each template of a control, are extracted and displayed.

value.span: 如果 控件的行（在 控件的各模板中定义）被提取和显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the rows of a control, defined in each template of a control, are extracted and displayed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的内容通过使用模板来指定。The contents of the control are specified by using templates. 通常, 你将列出要在模板中显示的控件。Normally, you list controls that you want to display in the templates. 您还可以在模板中放置控件并显示表中的行。You can also place a control in a template and display the rows of the table. 使用属性来指定是否提取并显示在控件的每个模板中定义的控件行。 Use the property to specify whether the rows of a control defined in each template of a control are extracted and displayed. 从控件的模板中提取的所有行都显示在单个表中。All rows extracted from the templates of the control are displayed in a single table. 这允许您从其他较小的表创建单个表, 并仍保留控件的功能。This allows you to create a single table from other smaller tables and still maintain the features of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果将此属性设置为`true`, 则必须为要包含在控件中的每个模板提供格式正确的控件。When this property is set to `true`, you must provide a well-formed control for each template you want to include in the control. 只显示表中的行。Only the rows of the tables will be displayed. 模板中的所有其他内容将被忽略。All other content in the template will be ignored. 若要使此功能正常工作, 必须使用控件。You must use a control for this feature to work properly. 控件与此属性不兼容。The control is not compatible with this property. 为模板中的控件创建单元格时, 可以使用对象的属性来控制单元格跨越的列数。When you create a cell for a control in a template, you can use the property of the object to control the number of columns the cell spans. 你还可以使用属性来控制单元格跨越的行数。You can also use the property to control the number of rows the cell spans. > [!NOTE] > 当此属性设置为时,、和属性不影响`true`控件的外观。The , , and properties do not affect the appearance of the control when this property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来提取和显示在控件的模板中定义的控件行。The following code example demonstrate how to use the property to extract and display the rows of controls defined in the templates of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). value.span: 默认值是一个空 对象。

span.span: The default value is an empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性为控件的脚注部分提供自定义样式。Use this property to provide a custom style for the footer section of the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括单元中的前景色、背景色、字体和内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强控件的外观。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 控件的属性继承属性的样式设置。The property of the control inherits the style settings of the property. 例如, 如果为属性指定红色字体, 则属性也将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, the property will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置单个样式属性来为控件提供常见的外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property. 可以通过设置属性来重写继承的样式设置。You can override the inherited style settings by setting the property. 例如, 您可以为属性指定一个蓝色字体, 并覆盖在属性中指定的红色字体。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 若要为脚注部分指定自定义样式, 请将``标记放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。To specify a custom style for the footer section, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始``标记中列出样式属性。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. > [!NOTE] > 属性必须设置为`true` , 此属性才可见。 The property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为控件的脚注部分指定自定义背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom background color for the footer section of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制标题部分的内容。Use the property to control the contents of the heading section. 标头部分的外观由属性控制。The appearance of the header section is controlled by the property. > [!NOTE] > 属性必须设置为`true` , 此属性才可见。 The property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible. 若要为标题部分指定模板, 请将``标记放在控件的开始和结束标记之间。To specify a template for the heading section, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始标记和结束``标记之间列出模板的内容。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制控件的标题部分的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the heading section of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件。 The method is used primarily by control developers to extend the control. 方法使用和方法来创建表示数据列表中包含的页眉、页脚、分隔符和数据绑定项的控件。The method uses the and methods to create controls that represent the header, footer, separator, and data-bound items contained in the data list. 您可以通过集合访问数据列表的数据绑定项。You can access the data-bound items for the data list through the collection. 您可以通过集合访问所有项类型, 包括页眉、页脚和分隔符项。You can access all item types, including the header, footer, and separator items, through the collection. 重写 方法以自定义控件创建或添加到控件的方式。 Override the method to customize how controls are created or added to the control. 重写方法以自定义控件的模板。Override the method to customize templates for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在控件中单击任何按钮时, 将引发`CommandName` 事件,并且通常在具有带有自定义值的按钮控件时使用。The event is raised when any button is clicked in the control and is commonly used when you have a button control with a custom `CommandName` value. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序, 以从控件中选择项。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to select an item from the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建控件中的项时, 将在往返过程中和数据绑定到控件时引发事件。The event is raised when an item in the control is created, both during round-trips and at the time data is bound to the control. 此事件通常用于控制控件中行的内容和外观。The event is commonly used to control the content and appearance of a row in the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序, 以便显示控件中的项的创建顺序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the order in which items in the control are created. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在项被数据绑定到控件后引发事件。The event is raised after an item is data bound to the control. 此事件提供了在客户端上显示数据项之前访问该数据项的最后机会。This event provides you with the last opportunity to access the data item before it is displayed on the client. 引发此事件后, 数据项将不再可用。After this event is raised, the data item is no longer available. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序, 以显示控件中的项绑定到控件的顺序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the order in which items in the control are bound to the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合以编程方式控制控件中的项。 Use the collection to programmatically control the items in the control. 集合不提供任何方法来向集合添加项或从中移除项。The collection does not provide any methods to add or remove items to the collection. 但是, 您可以通过为事件提供处理程序来控制项的内容。However, you can control the contents of an item by providing a handler for the event. > [!NOTE] > 集合中只包含绑定到数据源的项。Only items bound to the data source are contained in the collection. 标头、脚注和分隔符不包含在集合中。The header, footer, and separator are not included in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合来显示控件中的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to display the items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ItemStyle As TableItemStyle

summary.span: 获取 控件中项的样式属性。

span.span: Gets the style properties for the items in the control.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象包含 控件中项的样式属性。

span.span: A object that contains the style properties for the items in the control.

value.span: 默认值是一个空 对象。

span.span: The default value is an empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性为控件的项提供自定义样式。Use this property to provide a custom style for the items of the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括单元中的前景色、背景色、字体和内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强控件的外观。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 控件中的项样式属性从一个项样式属性继承到层次结构中的另一个。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在层次结构中设置较低的项样式属性将由层次结构中较高的项样式属性继承。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如, 如果为属性指定红色字体, 则控件中的所有其他项样式属性还将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置单个项样式属性来为控件提供常见的外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以通过设置层次结构中较高的项样式属性的样式属性来覆盖该属性的继承样式设置。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如, 您可以为属性指定一个蓝色字体, 并覆盖在属性中指定的红色字体。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表按从高到低的顺序列出了层次结构顺序。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |优先级Precedence|Style 属性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要为控件的项指定自定义样式, 请``将标记放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。To specify a custom style for the items of the control, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始``标记中列出样式属性。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. 还可以使用属性为控件中的交替项提供不同的外观。You can also use the property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为控件中的项指定不同的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a different background color for the items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制控件中项的内容。 Use the property to control the contents of the items in the control. 控件中项的外观由属性控制。The appearance of the items in the control is controlled by the property. 若要为控件的项指定模板, 请``将标记放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。To specify a template for the items of the control, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始标记和结束``标记之间列出模板的内容。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 您可以选择使用属性为控件中的交替项提供不同的外观。You can optionally use the property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制控件中项的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用, 不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过, 控件开发人员可以重写此方法, 以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法从方法保存的上一个页请求还原控件的视图状态信息。 The method restores view-state information for the control from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可为事件提供自定义处理程序。 Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 单击控件中`Cancel`的项的按钮时, 将引发事件。 The event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the control. 事件的典型处理程序将属性设置为`-1` (取消选择项 ), 然后将数据重新绑定到控件。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它取消单击 `Cancel`按钮时对控件中的项所做的任何编辑。It cancels any edits made to an item in the control when the `Cancel` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可为事件提供自定义处理程序。 Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 单击控件中`Delete`的项的按钮时, 将引发事件。 The event is raised when the `Delete` button is clicked for an item in the control. 事件的典型处理程序将从数据源中删除所选的项, 然后将数据重新绑定到控件。A typical handler for the event removes the selected item from the data source and then rebinds the data to the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 单击 按钮`Delete`时, 它将删除控件中的选定项。It deletes the selected item in the control when the `Delete` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可为事件提供自定义处理程序。 Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. `CommandName` `Add`当在控件中单击任何按钮时, 将引发事件,并且通常在控件中具有带有自定义值(如)的按钮控件时使用。The event is raised when any button is clicked in the control and is commonly used when you have a button control with a custom `CommandName` value, such as `Add`, in the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序, 以从控件中选择项。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to select an item from the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可为事件提供自定义处理程序。 Use the method to provide a custom handler for the event. 当单击某项的`Update`按钮时, 将引发该事件。The event is raised when the `Update` button for an item is clicked. 事件的典型处理程序将更新数据, 并将属性设置为`-1` (以取消选择项) , 然后将数据重新绑定到控件。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它允许您使用用户在单击 `Update`按钮时输入的新值来更新控件中的选定项。It allows you to update the selected item in the control with the new values entered by the user when the `Update` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定显示控件中的项的列数。Use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the control. 例如, 如果将此属性设置为`5`, 则控件将在五列中显示其项。For example, if you set this property to `5`, the control displays its items in five columns. > [!NOTE] > 如果将此属性设置为`0`, 则控件将基于属性的值在单个行或列中显示其项。If this property is set to `0`, the control displays its items in a single row or column, based on the value of the property. `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`如果将属性设置为, 则项显示在单个行中。If the property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items are displayed in a single row. `RepeatDirection.Vertical`如果将属性设置为, 则项显示在单个列中。If the property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items are displayed in a single column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定要在控件中显示的列数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the number of columns to display in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定控件的显示方向。 Use the property to specify the display direction of the control. > [!NOTE] > 显示的列数始终由属性确定。The number of columns displayed is always determined by the property. 如果将此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`, 则列表中的项将显示为从上到下、从左到右的列, 直到呈现所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items in the list are displayed in columns loaded from top to bottom, then left to right, until all items are rendered. 例如, 如果将属性设置为`3` , 则控件中的项将显示为三列, 如下表所示。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items in the control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|44|77| |22|55|88| |33|66|99| 如果将此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, 则列表中的项将显示为从左到右、从上到下的行, 直到呈现所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded from left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered. 例如, 如果将属性设置为`3` , 则控件的项将显示在每个项的各行中, 如下表所示。For example, if the property is set to `3`, the items of the control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table. |||| |-|-|-| |11|22|33| |44|55|66| |77|88|99| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定显示控件的方向。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the direction in which the control is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定控件中的项是否显示在表中。 Use the property to specify whether the items in the control are displayed in a table. 控件支持 的唯一值是和。 The only values that are supported by the control are and . 如果将此属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Table`, 则列表中的项将显示在表中。If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, the items in the list are displayed in a table. 如果将此属性设置为`RepeatLayout.Flow`, 则将显示列表中的项而不显示表结构。If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`, the items in the list are displayed without a table structure. 当控件显示在表中时, 可以使用属性来指定网格线样式。 When the control is displayed in a table, you can use the property to specify a grid line style. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定控件的布局样式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the layout style of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后发生的控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the control view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的对象。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的属性中, 该属性是类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后 , 将属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。The property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 页生命周期概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 保存视图状态时, 此字符串对象将作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 创作自定义服务器控件时, 可以通过重写方法并修改服务器控件的属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the property for your server control. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式指定控件中选定的项。 Use the property to programmatically specify the selected item in the control. 您还可以使用此属性来确定选定项的索引。You can also use this property to determine the index of the selected item. > [!NOTE] > 属性是从零开始的。The property is zero based. 若要取消选择某个项, 请将`-1`属性设置为。To deselect an item, set the property to `-1`. 属性存储在控件状态中。The property is stored in control state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定控件中的选定项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the selected item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可为控件中的选定项提供自定义样式。Use this property to provide a custom style for the selected item in the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括单元中的前景色、背景色、字体和内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强控件的外观。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 控件中的项样式属性从一个项样式属性继承到层次结构中的另一个。Item style properties in the control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy. 在层次结构中设置较低的项样式属性将由层次结构中较高的项样式属性继承。Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy. 例如, 如果为属性指定红色字体, 则控件中的所有其他项样式属性还将具有红色字体。For example, if you specify a red font for the property, all other item style properties in the control will also have a red font. 这使您可以通过设置单个项样式属性来为控件提供常见的外观。This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property. 您可以通过设置层次结构中较高的项样式属性的样式属性来覆盖该属性的继承样式设置。You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties. 例如, 您可以为属性指定一个蓝色字体, 并覆盖在属性中指定的红色字体。For example, you can specify a blue font for the property, overriding the red font specified in the property. 下表按从高到低的顺序列出了层次结构顺序。The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest. |优先级Precedence|Style 属性Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |11|| |22|| |33|| |44|| |55|| 若要为选定项指定自定义样式, 请将``标记放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。To specify a custom style for the selected item, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始``标记中列出样式属性。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为控件中的选定项指定自定义背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom background color for the selected item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制所选项目的内容。Use the property to control the contents of the selected item. 选定项的外观由属性控制。The appearance of the selected item is controlled by the property. 若要为选定项指定模板, 请将``标记放在控件的开始和结束标记之间。To specify a template for the selected item, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始标记和结束``标记之间列出模板的内容。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制控件中选定项的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the selected item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可为控件中的每个项之间的分隔符提供自定义样式。 Use the property to provide a custom style for the separator between each item in the control. 分隔符使你可以在控件中的每个项之间放置具有自定义内容的元素。The separator allows you to place an element with custom content between each item in the control. 可以调整的常见样式属性包括单元中的前景色、背景色、字体和内容对齐方式。Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell. 提供不同的样式可增强控件的外观。Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the control. 若要为分隔符指定自定义样式, 请将``标记放置在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间。To specify a custom style for the separator, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始``标记中列出样式属性。You can then list the style attributes within the opening `` tag. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定控件中每个项之间的分隔符的自定义背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom background color for the separator between each item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制控件项之间的分隔符的内容。 Use the property to control the contents of the separator between the items of the control. 分隔符使你可以在控件中的每个项之间放置具有自定义内容的元素。The separator allows you to place an element with custom content between each item in the control. 控件项之间的分隔符的外观由属性控制。The appearance of the separator between the items of the control is controlled by the property. 若要为分隔符指定模板, 请将``标记放在控件的开始和结束标记之间。To specify a template for the separator, place the `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后, 你可以在开始标记和结束``标记之间列出模板的内容。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制控件中每个项之间的分隔符的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the contents of the separator between each item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). span.span: Occurs when the button is clicked for an item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击某项的`Update`按钮时, 将引发该事件。The event is raised when the `Update` button for an item is clicked. 事件的典型处理程序将更新数据, 并将属性设置为`-1` (以取消选择项) , 然后将数据重新绑定到控件。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它允许您使用用户在单击 `Update`按钮时输入的新值来更新控件中的选定项。It allows you to update the selected item in the control with the new values entered by the user when the `Update` button is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
